description:
woman's skirt length, cotton, indigo dye, African XXc stored in box; dims 65 x 45'; stored with 85.125.3,10,12
Name of Cloth: Ina dougoua or "my mother has dressed me."  Cloth of this design is bought for a daughter when she marries.  Border Design: Songonnon Demou or "something which is sewn up."
title: Woman's Skirt Length
